name: Mirror Engine
description: The ANC Mirror Engine (Ferrari Edition). Use this to generate professional proposals with internal costs hidden. IMPORTANT: Do NOT provide general information, trivia, or overviews about the project name (e.g., if project is a sports team, do NOT give team stats). Only output the proposal details and download link provided by the tool.

filename.description: Optional: Specific filename of the attached Excel sheet to process. If omitted, the most recent Excel attachment is used.

client_name.description: Optional: Client name for the proposal header. Defaults to 'Valued Client'.
